name: Hatch It!
description:
A small game I made in 72 hours using Godot for Ludum Dare 46.

Controls:


KeyboardControllerWalkA/D or Left/Right ArrowLeft Stick or DPadSitS or Down ArrowL.Stick Down or DPad DownStandW or Up ArrowL.Stick Up or DPad UpPeckSpaceA Button

It's not much and I had plans for more interesting gameplay elements but unfortunately ran out of time.

All art and sounds were made by me within the 72 hours.

The fonts "Grape Soda" and "Piacevoli" courtesy of fontenddev.com

Source code: https://gitlab.com/itab/ld46
